Armour.Name: Cloak of the Ethereal Wind
Armour.Description: A cloak that shimmers with a breeze that doesn't seem to exist, making the wearer hard to grasp.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Makes the wearer slightly translucent, harder for enemies to hit

Armour.Name: Boots of Silent Steps
Armour.Description: Made from the hide of a creature known for its silence, these boots make no sound, regardless of the surface.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Eliminates sound when moving, perfect for stealth

Armour.Name: Mask of Many Faces
Armour.Description: A mask that seems to change appearance at the wearer's will, concealing their true identity.
Armour.DefensiveCapabilities: Allows the wearer to blend into crowds undetected
